name: Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash
synopsis: In this 2D platforming adventure, players control a little robot called Chibi-Robo as he travels the world to put a stop to an alien invasion. Using his plug and cord or ‘Chibi-Plug’, players can attack enemies and, using a variety of moves, get around each stage to find a variety of collectibles including real-world snacks to deliver to Chibi-Robo’s friends. The game features real snacks of third parties and includes depictions of real snacks of third parties. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
